title: Phase 8: Polish & Deploy
description: Performance optimization (texture compression, object pooling). Store preparation (icons, screenshots, descriptions). Deploy to Google Play and App Store.

title: Phase 2: Shared Code Migration
description: Port platform-independent game logic to shared project. Key files: Block.cs (1412 lines), LevelBoardController.cs (718 lines), MatchingGroup.cs, ComboManager.cs, PhysicsEngine.cs, GameStateManager.cs. Apply DI pattern, remove conditionals, write comprehensive tests.

title: Phase 0: Project Setup
description: Create new solution structure with SDK-style .csproj, set up .NET 8, configure CI/CD, create CHANGELOG.md

title: Phase 7: Testing & QA
description: Achieve 80%+ test coverage. Unit tests for core logic (90%), services (85%), UI (70%). Integration tests. Manual testing checklist. Performance testing (60fps, <200MB memory).

title: Phase 1: Core Abstractions
description: Extract platform-agnostic interfaces (ISoundManager, ISettingsManager, IAnalyticsService, IVibratorManager, INetworkManager, ILeaderboardService, IAchievementService, ITouchPanelService). Remove #if WINDOWS_PHONE conditionals. Create mock implementations.

title: Phase 4: Platform Projects
description: Create Android (API 24+) and iOS (12.0+) projects. Implement platform-specific services (Vibrator, TouchPanel). Handle lifecycle events. Test on physical devices.

title: HnK Port: MonoGame Modernization
description: Modernize Hamstas'n'Kitties from legacy Xamarin/MonoGame v3 to modern .NET 8/MonoGame with Firebase backend. Target: Android 7.0+, iOS 12.0+. TDD with 80%+ coverage.

title: Phase 5: Firebase Integration
description: Replace Scoreloop/Flurry with Firebase. Implement FirebaseAnalyticsService, FirestoreLeaderboardService, FirestoreCloudSaveService, HybridAchievementService. Test with Firebase Emulator.

title: Phase 3: UI Framework Migration
description: Modernize Scene/Layer system with DI. Migrate LayerObject, Layer, Scene, Button, Text, ListView components. Refactor Director pattern from singleton to DI. Migrate all game mode scenes and menu scenes.

title: Phase 6: Assets Migration
description: Create MonoGame content pipeline (Content.mgcb). Convert 150+ images, 38 sounds, 4 music tracks, sprite sheets, particle effects, fonts. Test loading on both platforms.
